result.execSummary:
The defendant Troy D. Laufenberg was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess w/Intent-Counterfeit Narcotics, a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(2)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: All Financial obligations shall be paid to the Clerk of Courts within 60 days unless a payment plan is established.
Shall undergo and follow through with any counseling, including Criminal Thinking, as directed by agent
Defendant shall not consume alcohol or other intoxicants.  Defendant must maintain absolute sobriety.
Defendant shall undergo an AODA Assessment and follow through with any recommendations resulting therefrom.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Cases Called 10:32 am, 15CF298 and 16cF44.  Defendant Troy D. Laufenberg in court with attorney Joseph Francis Fischer.  Kurt Frederich Klomberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty. Fischer is heard on status of cases, will withdraw plea on count 1 of 16CF44 and State will file amended information on this case.  Atty. Fischer makes oral motion to withdraw plea in case 16CF44.   Atty. Klomberg stipulates to the withdraw.  Court approves withdrawal of plea in 16CF44.  Atty. Klomberg provides amended information, is also being e-filed, with charge delivery of counterfeit substance.  Atty. Fischer acknowledges receipt of amended information and waives it's reading.  Atty. Klomberg is heard on agreement.  Court reviews charge penalty with defendant.  DE pleads NC to Count 1 of amended information in 16CF44.  Court reviews PQWOR with defendant.  Court advises of firearms possession penalties.  Court finds factual basis, Plea made FVI, accepts plea and finds guilty of count 1 of amended information in 16CF44.  Atty. Fischer heard, no factual changes to PSI.  Atty. Klomberg, no change to PSI, just change of charge.  Atty. Klomberg is heard on recommendation.  Atty. Fischer is heard.  Mr. Laufenberg makes statement.  Court is heard and sentence imposed:

15CF298 Count 1:
Sentence withheld:
2 years probation with conditions:
40 days DCJ, with H&T,  to commence on or before 5/17/17.

16CF44:
Sentence withheld,
2 1/2 years probation with conditions:

Costs,
$200 buy money,
Court adopts conditions as set forth in PSI.
